Class Grass

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.ecoquest.vk.actor.environment.Grass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor

    public class Grass
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actor
    Grass grows where no other actors are. It is a food resource for the rabbit
